content.query:
USE DWH_task2;
-- No Data to work with this dimention 
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[dim_account]
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'path-to-blob-storage/account-dimension/',
    DATA_SOURCE = [my_blob_storage],  
    FILE_FORMAT = [my_file_format]
) AS
SELECT 
    account_number AS account_id,   -- Primary Key
    member,                         -- Membership status (True/False)
    start_date,                     -- Membership start date
    end_date                        -- Membership end date
FROM staging_account;
